title: Litt's Pocketbook of Drug Eruptions and Interactions, Third E
description: The only work of its kind, Litt's Pocketbook of Drug Eruptions and Interactions is formatted for quick reference in the doctor's office, on hospital rounds, and in consultations. New in the third edition is coverage of herbals and supplements, an expanded range of reaction patterns, and lists of potentially hazardous interactions. Covering over 200 new drugs, Dr. Litt describes and catalogs the adverse cutaneous side effects of 930 commonly prescribed and over-the-counter drugs and herbals. Based on the Drug Eruptions Reference Manual and fully revised to include the 2003 data, this pocket version contains all the drugs, reactions, and interactions found in the larger manual and Web site (drugeruptiondata.com).
